name: Lamar Health
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Palo Alto, CA, USA
long_description:
Lamar Health provides a software platform to help doctors get insurance approvals for life-saving medication. 

We're founded by a team impacted by complex medical conditions that have experienced the underbelly of american healthcare. We're PhDs and technology experts on a mission to help millions of patients get access to the care they need.
one_liner: AI-Powered Prior Authorizations for Specialty Medications
